Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Lab Centrifuge^reset; to the ^green;annoying guy^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

If you want to advance your lab, you are going to want ^orange;lab centrifuge^reset;. Without one, you can't get ^green;an advanced centrifuge^reset; to produce high-end fissionable materials. Make a ^orange;Lab Centrifuge^reset; in a ^orange;Power Station^reset; and bring it to me.

Texts.Chs: 真的很棒。谢谢你的帮助。这是给你的奖励。
Texts.Eng: When you are able to, ^green;upgrade to an advanced centrifuge^reset; to really step up your lab game!
